name: wunint
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: wunss(cint(c0), c1, cuni(c0), wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cint(c0), c1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(c1, cwun))
-| wi(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cuni(c0), c1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wss(cint(c0), cuni(c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wcel(cint(c0), c1))

-| wi(wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)), wss(cint(c0), cuni(c0)))

body.origin:

comment: A weak universe is closed under nonempty intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
